Reason: The configuration option 'commitlog_sync_period_in_ms' is performance-sensitive. The code context shows that the value of 'commitlog_sync_period_in_ms' is directly used in the calculation of the periodic commit log sync block time in the getPeriodicCommitLogSyncBlock() method. This calculation directly impacts the system performance by determining the frequency of commit log sync operations, which are time-expensive and crucial for data durability.
